Gamma Cray

Jank Of All Trades

About Me

I’m making the jump from 20 years in trades to an online skillset and a healthier lifestyle. I’m incredibly fond of static site generators and I’m having a blast learning frontend web design. It’s a lot like building sailboats - pulling lines out of thin air and making them real with any tool available, many of them improvised or built specifically for the task.

I bring wisdom and experience from multiple fields including;

  • tiny-home construction
  • semi-professional musician
  • kitchen work
  • boat building
  • managing several meditation centers
  • permaculture farming
  • teaching ESL abroad

Experience

Boat Building

Self-employed/contract/freelance

2009 - present

  • 3 year apprenticeship under catamaran designer Richard Woods
  • 9 years contracting, custom fabrication and repair all over western Canada
  • Build and refit sailboats, yachts, work boats, research vessels
  • Hire crews as needed, deal with all aspects of business

Volunteering

Vipassana Meditation Centers - Canada & US

Kitchen Co-ordinator/Manager

2005 - 2015 (intermittent)

  • Train and manage up to 20 volunteers
  • Food and supply orders
  • Maintain FoodSafe protocols and practices
  • Routine maintenance and repairs

AYNI Peru

ESL Teacher/Care Aide

2002 - 2003

  • Daily lesson planning for grades 2 - 5
  • Work with staff and clients of inpatient care home
  • Distribute donations and organize international channels for same

A Little More About Me

I spend my downtime surfing, playing chess, and walking the beautiful forests and trails of Vancouver Island with my dog. I’m passionate about learning, healthy living, the environment, and social issues. I believe a better world is possible and I’m extremely happy to be here to see it unfold.
